name: Nonlinear Browser
description: Representing browser tabs in a tree for contextual thought
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://d3js.org/d3.v6.min.js https://w.appzi.io/w.js https://w.appzi.io/v1-v2-compat.js https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com; ; connect-src 'self' wss://*.firebaseio.com; object-src 'self'
